content: This reminds me vaguely of http://www.ted.com/talks/jonathan_haidt_on_the_moral_mind We choose what we already believe and be willing to see what’s on the other side of our preexisting belief while at the same time evaluating why someone might say and believe what they do. That’s when we can more accurately evaluate where “information” comes from. And yet at the same time, “what is truth?” remains…
